summary: Implemented new /terms, /login, and /signup routes/pages; updated Home hero/banner to requested headline/CTA with subtle gradient background; added a manual featured-stories carousel; added Header/Footer navigation entries. Some acceptance-criteria details are not fully met (mobile nav link implementation and post-auth redirect behavior).

missing_requirements.requirement: All new navigation links (including mobile menu) should use TanStack Router <Link> components and match existing hover/active styling patterns; header must include a Terms link on both desktop and mobile menus.
missing_requirements.reason: Header desktop uses <Link>, but the mobile menu renders navigation items as <button> elements that call navigate() rather than using TanStack Router <Link> components (including the Terms entry). This does not meet the AC requirement that new links use the existing Link components on desktop and mobile.

missing_requirements.requirement: After successful login/signup, redirect the user to an appropriate page (at minimum Home, or the originally attempted page if that context is available).
missing_requirements.reason: Login and Signup pages always redirect to '/' after successful authentication; there is no evidence of capturing/using an attempted-route context for redirecting back to the originally requested page.
